title: Ticket #7433: Use faster getClassAdEx when collector reads private ads
description: The collector reads the public startd ad (and all other UPDATE...) via the tuned getClassAdEx function, but reads in the private ad with the slower getClassAd. The private ads, though smaller, can also benefit from the tuning in getClassAdEx.
remarks:
Note this is an internal change, and doesn't need a version history entry
2020-Apr-10 07:46:37 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.
